title: Anne Hathaway
summary: Anne Jacqueline Hathaway (born November 12, 1982) is an American actress and singer. She is the recipient of various accolades, including an Academy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Primetime Emmy Award, and was among the world's highest-paid actresses in 2015. Her films have grossed over $6.8Â billion worldwide, and she appeared on the Forbes Celebrity 100 list in 2009.
